pages.text: This contains pages for the following items:$(li)Hand Crank$(li)Copper Valve Handle$(br2)I highly recommend against using these for powering your factories for obvious reasons. Only use for manual things like lowering or raising a hose pulley or rope pulley or using a millstone.

The Hand Crank outputs higher RPM than the Copper Valve Handle. $(br2)How to use: $(br)Hold right click while standing to rotate counter-clockwise.$(br2)Hold right click while sneaking to rotate clockwise.

The Copper Valve Handle is more suited for fluid related use like opening valves and aesthetics. $(br2)How to use:$(br)Hold right click while standing to rotate counter-clockwise.$(br2)Hold right click while sneaking to rotate clockwise.
